caption.title: Reduction of suitable Caatinga habitat (probability of occurrence > 80%) for endemic flowering plant species in the current period and in two future scenarios, an optimistic (RCP4.5) and a pessimistic (RCP8.5).
caption.p: (A) Habit (N = 76). (B) Pollination systems (N = 64). (C) Reproductive systems (N = 25). (D) Dispersal modes (N = 62). Different letters below the boxplots indicate statistical significance of post-hoc comparisons at P < 0.05.
